select-areas.content: This {{ eventName}} warning is based on: {{forecastSourceLabel}}. To set this warning as a trigger, select {{adminAreaLabelPlural}} where the Early Action Protocol should be activated.

confirm.bullet-list:
• The {{adminAreaLabelPlural}} that are not selected will remain visible as warning areas, but cannot be added later.
  • This actions impacts what is shown in the portal for all users.
  • A notification regarding the trigger will be sent to all users.
confirm.understand: I understand that this action cannot be undone.
confirm.success: The trigger has been set successfully.
confirm.error: Something went wrong in setting the trigger. Please try again.

no-access.content:
Only IBF focal point users are authorized to set a trigger from a warning.
If you require permissions, please contact the current IBF focal point admin@mail.com or {{ supportEmailAddress }}.

timeline-component.tooltip:
The timeline displays dates of the predicted events with a purple background and an alert icon.
  • Warning: display an outlined alert sign.
  • Trigger: display a filled alert sign.
Selecting one event will also highlight the corresponding dates with a purple outline.
